mn129:2.4: ca kena naṁ → na tena naṁ (mr); na naṁ (?)
mn129:3.7: saṁvijjanteva te → saṁvijjante te ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn129:22.6: ye vā panaññepi keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā asucismiṁ jāyanti asucismiṁ jīyanti asucismiṁ mīyanti → etthantare pāṭho pts1ed potthake
mn129:24.7: Yadi pana → yadi nūna (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn129:27.4: ca, kena naṁ → na tena naṁ (mr); na naṁ (?)
mn129:35.5: Svāgataṁ te, mahārāja → svāgataṁ mahārāja (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn129:35.8: bhavanti → ahesuṁ (sya-all, km, mr) | anuyantā → anuyuttā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn129:41.2: upayāpetabbaṁ upayāpetuṁ → upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ upaṭṭhāpetuṁ (bj, sya-all, km); upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ upaṭṭhapetuṁ (pts1ed)
mn129:46.3: Ekamekenapi, bhante, ratanena → tena bhante ratanena (bj, pts1ed)
